attributes.action: Raise awareness for the people in Sudan and raise money to get rid of poverty
attributes.additional_details: Action needs to be taken and going straight to the government is the best thing to do to spread awareness and help.
attributes.background: So far, there has been more media and government presence on the fire of Notre Dame, when there are families, and children and mothers and fathers dying and living poverty. That is awful. The fact that so little people know anything about this massive crisis is terrible.
